name: Arabic Hangman
body:
#Hangman This is a hangman game that was dedicated to Arabic learners, but which can be easily updated and adapted to any other language or purpose through the configuration file data.json.

DEMO

================== The database is **data.json**.

Overview

This is an implementation of the hangman game using HTML/JS/CSS and deploying a json database. it includes : - Customizable categories with multiple selection - A hint option - A responsive interface (Desktop/Mobile) - Adaptative design - The possibility of documenting the answers through other websites like dictionaries

Configuration

```javascript var direction = "rtl"; var alphabet = ['أ', 'ب', 'ت', 'ث', 'ج', 'ح', 'خ', 'د', 'ذ', 'ر', 'ز', 'س', 'ش', 'ص', 'ض', 'ط', 'ظ', 'ع', 'غ', 'ف', 'ق', 'ك', 'ل', 'م', 'ن', 'ه', 'و','ي', 'ؤ', 'ئ', 'إ', 'ا', 'ء' ,'ى', 'آ', 'ة']; var levels = ["Novice", "Beginner", "Intermediate", "Advanced", "Encyclopedic"]; var categoriesInfo = [ {"title":"Farm animals","zOption":"","status":"selected", "doc":"http://www.almaany.com/en/dict/ar-en/"}, {"title":"countries","zOption":"","status":"selected", "doc":"ar.wikipedia.org/wiki/"}, {"title":"Food and drinks","zOption":"","status":"disabled", "doc":"http://www.almaany.com/en/dict/ar-en/"}, ]; var categories = [ [ {"word":"كبش", "hint":"العيد", "indication":"", "level":"0"}, {"word":"حمار", "hint":"صبور", "indication":"", "level":"0"}, {"word":"بقرة", "hint":"تُعطينا الحليب", "indication":"", "level":"0"}, ], [ {"word":"اليمن", "hint":"بِلاد سَبأ", "indication":"", "level":"0"}, {"word":"عمان", "hint":"البلد الوحيد الذي فيه يبدأ بحرف العين", "indication":"", "level":"0"}, ], [ {"word":"عصير", "hint":"juice", "indication":"", "level":"1"}, {"word":"مشروب غازي", "hint":"soda", "indication":"", "level":"1"}, ] ]; ```

Perspectives

The next version will include : - A new design - A level system - A social scorer - Rich categories and new words And other ameliorations
